messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Something about Mary
messages.msgSnippet: ... Well, I can t speak for the other(s), but I m Life is Good Mary, aka zenmomma, aka Help, I m trapped in Utah and I can t get out! ;-) Life is good. ~Mary
messages.messageBody:
>Here's a strange off topic question
>Is
>Living in abundance Mary,
>LoveMary,
>and Life is Good Mary
>All the same person? LOL
>I'm confused! :o)

Well, I can't speak for the other(s), but I'm Life is Good Mary, aka
zenmomma, aka "Help, I'm trapped in Utah and I can't get out!" ;-)

Life is good.
~Mary

messages.subject: Something about Mary
messages.msgSnippet: Here s a strange off topic question Is Living in abundance Mary, LoveMary, and Life is Good Mary All the same person? LOL I m confused! :o) ~Elissa Cleaveland
messages.messageBody:
Here's a strange off topic question
Is
Living in abundance Mary,
LoveMary,
and Life is Good Mary
All the same person? LOL
I'm confused! :o)
~Elissa Cleaveland
"It is nothing short of a miracle that the modern methods of instruction
have
not yet entirely strangled the holy curiosity of inquiry." A. Einstein
